text: "I Will Follow" is a 1980 song by Irish rock band U2. It is the lead single from their debut studio album Boy. It peaked at number 34 in New Zealand and number 71 in Australia. ==Formats and track listings== Note *The Netherlands release was recorded for the Veronica TV concert series Countdown, and was reissued in Germany in 1983. The cover of the Canadian and U.S. releases feature the same image as the North American release of Boy. The 1983 release was in a generic red sleeve with no cover artwork. == References == Category:1980 songs Category:U2 songs
title: I Will Follow
